#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,count,i;
    long int n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              count=0;i=1;
              cin>>n;
              while(pow(2,i)<=n)
              {
              if(n==pow(2,i))
              count++;
              i++;
              }
              if(count)
              cout<<"BKUL"<<endl;
              else
              cout<<"BMEENA"<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
